page.title: 19GALA DAY
page.content: During the events of the{Gala Day, various shows and stalls took place. There were stalls which sold home-made cakes,pastries and confectioneries. There were also raffles for food,furry toys,footballs and one to win a meal for 2.Children enjoyed donkey rides, football,skittles and other stalls. The days{programme}was:11.35am:The Procession leaves Church Hall; 12pm: Crowning Ceremony; 12.30:Royal Party proceeds to{Public Park;}1.00:Display by Queensferry Pipe Band; 1.20:Tug o' War,Highland dancing and Majorettes; 2.20:Pensioners' races,Accordion Band; 3.20:Grand Prize Draw; 4.00:The Grand Finale. A mobile disco provided pop music and a local fire engine allowed the kids to use the water hose.The week ended with a disco for adults in the {Community Centre.
